entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opening a Source Generator file resulted in a handful of gold bars #57618
  • Completion in dotted property pattern incorrect for nullable value type properties #57616

Closed

  • Code Navigation bar does not show event handlers in VB Winforms App #57516
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Ensure we select a 'VB WithEvents' member in the navbar list when the user enters that member in the editor. #57606
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57619
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • AbstractFlowPass - VisitArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting `initializer`. #57612
    Area-Compilers
